Header.title: What is SPARSH?
Header.paragraph: One Stop solution for all your skin problems.

About.paragraph: Skin conditions are one of the most widespread diseases in the world. Despite being common its diagnosis is extremely difficult because of its complexities of skin tone, color, presence of hair.This uses various computer vision based techniques (deep learning) to automatically predict the various kinds of skin conditions just by capturing the diseased area using a normal image.
About.Why2: We have developed a Deep Learning model which predicts skin disease just by looking at the picture. Isn't that just amazing!!!! We have used state of the art Deep Learning methods and developed a Convulational Neural Network which which is fast , efficient and reliable.
